member.name: T:VirtualGrid.Razer.RazerPeripheralBaseAdapter
member.summary: An abstract adapter to convert into Razer-compatible effects. For more information about Razer Chroma LED profile : https://developer.razer.com/works-with-chroma/razer-chroma-led-profiles/
